title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1984/90 of 11 July 1990 amending for the ninth time Regulation (EEC) No 646/86 fixing the export refunds on wine
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1984/90
of 11 July 1990
amending for the ninth time Regulation (EEC) No 646/86 fixing the export refunds on wine
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 646/86, '- the German Democratic Republic,' is hereby inserted between '-Morocco,' and '-Switzerland,' in the list in footnote (1) under 03.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 July 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 84, 27. 3. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 132, 23. 5. 1990, p. 19.
(3) OJ No L 60, 1. 3. 1986, p. 46.
(4) OJ No L 73, 17. 3. 1989, p. 20.
